definition: (lit.) oil, salt, soy sauce and vinegar/(fig.) the trivia of everyday life
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam
lit. firewood, rice, oil, salt, soy, vinegar, and tea/fig. life's daily necessities
pinyin: chai2 mi3 you2 yan2 jiang4 cu4 cha2

sentences.english: We should know how to preserve the flavours of our life.
sentences.chinese: 我們要懂得調理好生活中的油鹽醬醋。
